data.name: Efflorescence of Lust
data.detailed_description:
推荐好玩的游戏！

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2083560/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2026520/_the_Apocryphal_Gensoukyou/


About the Game

Efflorescence of Lust is a combination of puzzle and clicker games.
It helps enhance your agility and reaction capability.
It can also help you get a relief from anxiety by playing it.

Features:
1. The game contents are rich, there are 2 games you can play with.
2. Creative jigsaw puzzle game consisting of 7 stages.
3. Fascinating clicker game consisting of 6 stages with attractive anime girl in each.
4. Amazing anime girl animations!
5. Nice musics!
6. High resolution images and animations!

DLC Content & Install Method:
The game features DLC which allows you to have additional contents.
Hold Win+R to start Run, then type "steam://install/1234740" or "steam://rungameid/1234740", press Enter at last. The DLC will be installed.
After installing the DLC, view mode for Click Game will be unlocked, and you will be able to see incredible contents.

Community:
If you have doubts in the game, please contact us.

【Twilight Sonata Studio游戏交流】

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:
Disclaimer:
All characters in this work are over 18 years old. The game story is fictitious, please do not imitate the player, such as the similar situation in the plot is purely coincidental.
